summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the functionality of MODFLOW 6 output utilities, focusing on extracting discharge indices, opening cell‑by‑cell (CBC) files under different model configurations (steady, transient, unconfined, with or without storage), reading CBC headers, and loading discharge grid data into xarray structures.
business_intent: Ensure reliable parsing and interpretation of MODFLOW 6 simulation results so that downstream hydrologic analyses and visualizations can depend on accurate, time‑aware data extraction from model output files.
